summary:
REVIEW OF BIKKEL
Bikkel (Vlaardingen, NL, born Curaçao, 1948)
Studied at Willem de Kooning Academy (judicium exceptional), 1996-2002
Specialty is glass design and visual art (paintings). 
Free work and commissioned.

The goal is to work with bright and transparent colors to reflect the warmth of my native Curaçao and to make all layers of my emotions visible.
Bikkel glass designs and paintings are in well-known museums and private collections. Such as the Voorlinden museum, Het Curaçaosch Museum, Museum Maassluis, Haegeumgang Theme MUSEUM/Yukyung Art Museum.

Contact:
BIKKEL
bikkelartist@outlook.com
www.bikkelartist.com

treasury_media.title: Bikkel - Bull HOLLAND - oil painting on canvas - 100x100cm - 2014
treasury_media.description: A Museal MoA Print of this oil painting " Bull Holland" of Bikkel will been exhibited at the carroussel du LOUVRE, 24-25-26 October 2014, Paris.

projects.title: WAG NL 2014 Group
projects.description:
Programm WAG NL 2014 Group
our motivation: binding souls and create love
 
WAG NL 2014 Group: 
Samuël Dumfries 		poet/writer
Jaffar Forster 			djembee
Marvin Duin			djembee 
Ash Quant 			djembe
Slavko Dujic 			painter
Bikkel  				painter

Appearance WAG NL 2014 Group
1,5 hour appearance (3x)
declamation poems (Samuel Dumfries). Accompanyed by djembee and singing (Jaffar, Ash, Marvin). Inspired making quick painting on stage (Slavko, Bikkel)
theme: binding souls and create love
	
Total: 
-	3 day’s appearance WAG NL 2014 Group
-	1 day Workshop dance/music/singing
-	1 day Workshop rap/painting/theater
-	1 day Workshop quickpainting/poems/drums
-	every day till finished wall painting by whole group with help from local artists or citizens
-	every day working on paintings for exhibition

contributors.name: Samuël Dumfries Jaffar Forster Marvin Duin Ash Quant Slavko Dujic Bikkel artist

projects.title: Opera "My Colourful Past"
projects.description:
Hoe is het leven van verschillende wereldberoemde schilders, als zij op reis zijn voor de opening van een van hun vele exposities? Ook na hun dood is hun werk nog altijd te bewonderen in de vele kunstboeken die overal te koop zijn. Zoals in souvenirshops of in Museum winkeltjes.

De basis van deze voorstelling vormt de liedcyclus “Le travail du peintre” van Poulenc (1956). De aanvullingen in het programma zijn van tijdgenoten, zoals Debussy en anderen. 

Voorstellingen:
Première: Vrijdag 16 November 2012, 20.15 uur, Stadsgehoorzaal Vlaardingen.
Kaartjes reserveren: 010-4340500 of www.stadsgehoorzaal.nl. Prijs E 12,50 pp.

Regie: Julia Kleute
Libretto en Totaal Concept: Bikkel 
Producent: Bikkel

Sopraan: Julia Kleute 
Piano: Sofia Vasheruk
Hedendaags kunstenaar: Bikkel 

Correspondentie adres: Bikkel
A.Romein-Verschoorkade 42, 3137 TS Vlaardingen
E: bikkelartist@outlook.com    T: 010-4744370

profile_positions.description:
Bikkel Artist (from Netherlands, born at Curaçao) – Bikkel’s process of working is spontaneous and she works with vibrant colors, forms and placing objects so as to acquire their textures. Everything reflects the warmth of her iland of birth, Curaçao. 

Bikkel is graduated with exceptional exam in 2002, from University of Professional Education Rotterdam, Willem de Kooning Academy. Bikkel’s glass design and paintings are get into famous Musea and Private collections. Such as The Curacao Museum, Museum Maassluis and Museum Voorlinden.
profile_positions.title: Glass design and Visual Art

Glass Art on Walls, the new Glass of Bikkel
They keep reminding me that we want 
Glass Art on Walls, a place to dream and chill
I can not help feeling
I want Bikkel’s glass all around

Hooks & Plugs you need
To hang up the Glass Walls of Bikkel
all you have to do 
is enjoy

Pishiporko’s, fishes of Curacao,
They jump just like Bikkel 
Back to earth, were they belong.

Just as the economy crises.
